attributes.action: make employers pay a generous amount of "danger money" to employees who working with children and vulnerable people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given today's political climate and public opinion, working with children and vulnerable people can be quite dangerous. Any false allegation can damage the accused's reputation before they have a chance to defend themselves in court. Professional and personal relationships can remain damaged even though the accused is aqquited.

I propose the following: Due to the nature of the job, employees should be paid generous "danger money" for the potential risks. A sensible sum should be £5,000/year+ on top of normal salaries depending on assessed risk to the employee.
The money will come from the institutions / organisations who expose their employees to such risk.

NOTE: This petition has nothing to do with the CRB check system.
